p: Samples in column no. 1 were collected in the province of Inner Mongolia, in the vicinity of the city of Bao Tou (was collected in June); no. 2, collected in July; no. 3, collected in the vicinity of Beijing, in the Xian Shan Mountains region (in August). No. 4 were collected in the Peter the Great Botanical Garden Botanical Institute of RAS (St. Petersburg, Russia) (in August).
